fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Note that this question applies to citizens only. Note also that we are interested in legal (de jure) restrictions, not restrictions that may be operative in practice (de facto). In cases where married people are allowed to vote at a younger age than single people, the higher(older) age minimum for single voters is given (see v2elage).
fxInfo_question: What is the level of suffrage practiced?

fxInfo_responses.value: Indirect suffrage and/or offices filled by appointment only
Age differential: Married people vote at younger age than single

fxInfo_sources: IFES; IDEA; Nohlen et al. (1999, 2002, 2005, 2010); Furtak (1990); KRWE (1987-2012); KRWE/KCA (1931-1987); Mackie and Rose (1991); Posada-Carb√≥ (1996); IPU; constituteproject.org. See Reif GVED and Reif EDATES (2011, 2012 for additional country-specific sources).
name: v2elgvsuflvl
